page.title: 13PETS
page.content: The nearest vet is Abbot, Polden & Draper in Harleigh Rd. Bodmin. They have about{25 calls a day. }At Panters Bridge in a shed is a kind of pet shop. It is owned by Walter Masters. Some children and parents from our school buy their pet and animal foods from him. He sells corn, cow cake, chicken food, pig food almost any pet food. He has a dark blue transit van. Most people seem to have cats and dogs as pets. Edward Murray's dog is a golden labrador which is the same as Natalie Hall's. Mr. Farnsworth has two long haired cats and two pidgeons. Emily Ovenden has one guinea pig which she keeps in a cage outside. Mrs. Searle has one rabbit, Wendy Oates has one goldfish and some children have ponies.
